title: Couple's Court PT 2: VOTE - Kristin Vs Her Husband In The Case Of Giving Kids Joy
description:
Kristin wants to do something for the neighbors. She thinks it would be really special to host a Movie Night for the kiddos around the block! And luck would have it she knows a couple people in studio who have all the equipment needed to set up the event! Only problem? Her husband says, "Absolutely not!"
SO, like any good radio family, they're putting the decision in your hands! What do you think they should do?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
